member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.PublishingPageCollection.Add(System.String,Microsoft.SharePoint.SPFile,System.Guid,System.String,Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.PageConversionPriority)

This exception should always be caught by the caller.If the PublishingPage member of this exception is not null, the issue that caused the exception is a converter warning. The page can be used with the caveat that it has potentially significant fidelity issues, depending on the converter warning.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.WebServices.PublishingService.ReconnectPageLayout(System.String)
member.summary: Use this method to reconnect a object to its object and replace its custom markup with default PublishingPage markup.
member.returns: A of the form .A ReturnCode of 1 means that the PublishingPage is reconnected to the same PageLayout object specified in URL from which it was originally disconnected.A ReturnCode of 2 means that the PublishingPage was not reconnected to the same PageLayout object specified in URL from which it was originally disconnected. Instead, it was reconnected to one of the available PageLayout objects for the content type of this PublishingPage.
member.param: Server-relative URL of the PublishingPage to be reconnected.
